title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-7.4 - Uniform balance sheet
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-7.4 - Uniform balance sheet

State Regulations
A uniform balance sheet, to be prepared by the local
agency, is prescribed and is shown as Exhibit 22 of Appendix S-11. The uniform
balance sheet as prepared and submitted by the local agency, shall include only
those accounts which are active in the general ledger and/or show balances as
of the closing date of the period for which the report is being
filed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1646-7.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
